name: Job Hunt
description: Job Hunt - The Ultimate Notion Template for Landing Your Dream JobSearching for a job can be a challenging and overwhelming process. That's why we created Job Hunt, the ultimate Notion template designed to streamline your job search and give you a competitive edge in today's market. Whether you're a recent graduate, career changer, or seasoned professional, Job Hunt has the tools you need to organize your job hunt, track applications, and showcase your unique skills and value proposition.The Bas
features: Contacts: Organize and manage important contacts throughout your job search journey, ensuring you stay connected and build valuable connections.; Documents: Store your current resume and cover letter files in one centralized location for easy access and customization.; Job Boards: Keep all your job board links in one place, making it convenient to explore and find new job opportunities.; Tracker: Monitor and track your job applications, ensuring you never miss an important follow-up or interview opportunity.; Strength and Values (Advanced): Articulate your unique strengths and values to highlight your personal brand and stand out to potential employers.; Salary Research (Advanced): Conduct comprehensive salary research to equip yourself with valuable insights for negotiations and ensure fair compensation.; Portfolio Template (Advanced): Showcase your skills, projects, and achievements with the Portfolio template, leaving a lasting impression on hiring managers.; Customizable and Flexible: Tailor Job Hunt to fit your unique needs and preferences. Customize sections, adapt the template to match your workflow, and make it your own.
